channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: TOTP
channel.desc: David Hamilton presents the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 20 May 1976 and featuring Showaddywaddy, Marmalade, Tina Charles, Robin Sarstedt, Mud, Cliff Richard and The Four Seasons.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: TOTP
channel.desc: John Peel and Janice Long presents the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 9 May 1985 and featuring The Style Council, Steve Arrington, Curtis Hairston and Paul Hardcastle.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: TOTP
channel.desc: Peter Powell and Mike Read present the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 17 October 1985. Featuring Shakin' Stevens, a-ha, Elton John, Colonel Abrams and Jennifer Rush.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Wham! at the BBC
channel.desc: Andrew Ridgeley, Pepsi DeMacque and Shirlie Kemp present Wham!'s biggest performances.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Wild Boys
channel.desc: Documentary charting the rise and fall of the pop group synonymous with 1980s glamour. Hits featured include Girls on Film, Rio and Hungry Like the Wolf. Contains some strong language.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Culture Club - Young Guns Go for It
channel.desc: Documentary series examining the music and musical icons of the 80s. This programme traces the story of Culture Club. Contains strong language.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: The 80s - Music's Greatest Decade?
channel.desc: In this music compilation, Dylan Jones celebrates some of the stars who created the timeless legacy of the 1980s, from Prince to Madonna and Duran Duran to Sade.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: TOTP
channel.desc: Jo Whiley presents the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 12 December 1997 and featuring Robbie Williams, Sheryl Crow, Blackstreet, Five, All Saints and Teletubbies.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: TOTP
channel.desc: Jayne Middlemiss presents the pop chart programme, featuring Natalie Imbruglia, Robbie Williams, Bryan Adams, All Saints, Chicken Shed, Celine Dion and Sting & The Police.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: TOTP
channel.desc: Mike Read presents the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 22 May 1980 and featuring The Lambrettas, UK Subs, Jona Lewie, Karel Fialka, the Specials, Matchbox and Johnny Logan.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: This is BBC Four
channel.desc: Programmes start at 7.00pm.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: This is BBC Four
channel.desc: Programmes start at 7.00pm.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: The Rabbits of Skomer
channel.desc: Documentary about the wild rabbits that share the sea cliffs on the island of Skomer, off the Pembrokeshire coast, with seabirds like puffins and seagulls.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: All Creatures Great and Small
channel.desc: Calum tickles a few trout, Tricki Woo enters the dog show, and Bramble, the cow with a wink, is a success.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: All Creatures Great and Small
channel.desc: James visits Granville Bennett's lavishly impressive small-animal hospital, the fruits of which are evidently much richer than the hard-grafting life of James's practice.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Brian Cox Remembers... Bob Servant
channel.desc: Actor Brian Cox takes a fond look back on a character who occupies a very special place in his heart, the would-be MP for Broughty Ferry, Bob Servant.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Bob Servant
channel.desc: A radio appearance leads to a visit from the police and protests from local dog owners. Contains some strong language.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Bob Servant
channel.desc: The by-election favourite Nick Edwards arrives and Bob is determined to derail him. Contains some strong language and adult humour.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Bob Servant
channel.desc: Looking for a campaign boost, Bob courts the religious vote and Broughty Ferry's women. Contains some strong language and adult humour.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Mark Lawson Talks to Brian Cox
channel.desc: Brian Cox talks about his passion for portraying complex and difficult characters, his personal psychological battles and the low point in his career when he almost gave up acting.
